context.text: List of Best Supporting Actress winners by age at win - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Rank Age Name Film Annual Year Date of Birth Date of Award Notes
List of Best Supporting Actress winners by age at win

This is a list of winners of the Academy Award of Merit for Performance by an Actress in a Supporting Role , presented annually by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences (AMPAS) to an actress who has delivered an outstanding performance while working within the film industry . More popularly known as the Academy Award (or the Oscar) for Best Supporting Actress , this award was initially presented at the 9th Academy Awards ceremony for 1936 and was most recently presented at the 80th Academy Awards ceremony for 2007 . Throughout the past 72 years, accounting for ties and repeat winners, AMPAS has presented a total of 72 Best Supporting Actress awards to 70 different actresses. This is a list of winners arranged in descending order by age of the actress on the date of the award ceremony in which she was named Best Supporting Actress. This list is current as of the 80th Academy Awards ceremony held on February 24, 2008.
List of Best Supporting Actress winners by age at win
